extendedInfo.description: Fly Buys for Android gives you access to key Fly Buys information on the go!KEY FEATURES:â¢ Check your Points Balance - so you can work out how many points you need to get your dream rewardâ¢ See your latest Points Collection Transactions - keep on top of all the places you collect pointsâ¢ Access current Bonus Point Offers - make the most out of Fly Buys by keeping up-to-date with the latest Bonus Point offersâ¢ Access your virtual card - see a virtual version of your very own card... just in case your forget the real thingâ¢ Access Fly Buys websites - get quick access to all the Fly Buys websites including Fly Buys Music, Fly Buys Communities, Fly Buys TXT, Fly Buys Visa and Fly Buys e-storesâ¢ Contact us

reviews.title: make it better
reviews.comment: wish it displayed my barcode so I could use it instead of carrying my card around. like subway. and wish I didn\'t need to enter my password everytime I open the app
reviews.author: Sacha Ponder

reviews.title: So basic is almost pointless
reviews.comment: Very basic app. Really has no use other than to check your points balance.  Usefull things would be ability to scan from the app rather than the card, my \'dreamlist\' items.  Why do i need to see a picture of my card???
reviews.author: Amy Pye

reviews.title: Would be handy...
reviews.comment: ...if it saved your password. Makes it pretty useless without that basic function.
reviews.author: Adam Doar

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: Won\'t let me login, complete waste of time. Also won\'t operate in landscape so have to remove tablet from keyboard dock to use. Very disappointing.
reviews.author: Robert Thornley

reviews.title: Needs more
reviews.comment: Put a bar code on! Only installed cause it said it has a virtual card, thats not a virtual card thats just my number that I could have found else where. Will see if an update comes soon or I\'ll un-install
reviews.author: Dane Fraser

reviews.title: can\'t log in??
reviews.comment: won\'t let me log in enter my details & website says \' please try again over & over again? please fix.
reviews.author: Trish Baker

reviews.title: Average as
reviews.comment: Hafta sign in each time it\'s just annoying.
reviews.author: Maxine Skilton

reviews.title: Can\'t log in!
reviews.comment: I can log in online but won\'t let me log in on app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Is a good app but
reviews.comment: Is a good app but when on the login screen I can\'t exit by going back.
reviews.author: Toby Howard

reviews.title: Scannable Card
reviews.comment: 5 stars if it had a scannable card on the app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Alright
reviews.comment: Would be amazing if you could actually use the app to scan your card. So handy!
reviews.author: Melissa Downing

reviews.title: Still basic
reviews.comment: I thnk a lot of improvement can be made
reviews.author: Pheng Taing

reviews.title: Flybys
reviews.comment: Cool
reviews.author: Sam Everitt

reviews.title: Galaxy S2/Note 10.1
reviews.comment: Was great, but won\'t let me log in anymore, please fix it. Fixed, thankyou, works like a dream again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesnt wrk!!
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t let me log in anymore. Let me log in wen 1st installed but not anymre. Fix dis problem plz
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sg SII
reviews.comment: Can\'t log in anymore. More useful of could scan a bar code
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t log in...
reviews.comment: Seems like this has been a problem for a little while now...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: Needs scannable bar code and ability to remember password. Ability to order rewards through app instead of website would be good too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok needs scannable bar code
reviews.comment: Needs to be able to actually replace the card. Tap/swipe the picture of the card to show the barcode
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pffft
reviews.comment: Does not log me in. Ive tried about 20 times. No good
reviews.author: A Google User
